Name: Portfolio Website
Description: My personal portfolio built with Blazor WebAssembly.

Name: Sprint Planning Tool
Description: A Blazor-based collaborative sprint planning tool.

Name: Homewide Adblock System
Description: Less programming focused, but very practical project.

Name: SAM Project
Description: Engineer's thesis and continuation as a job.

Name: News Reacts
Description: I was hired to a small company to work on a game named News Reacts. The game was successfully released in steam in May 2022.

Name: ML/AI DIRECTOR
Description: Innovation project for school. Our customer was Bigger Scope, who wanted a ML / AI director which would control the game flow according to player's game style.'

Name: OpenGL Renderer
Description: Basic scene rendering with OpenGL and C++

Name: Nords and Swords
Description: I was the lead programmer in a collaboration project of 2 schools. We got a solid end result, which can downloaded from my Google Drive.

Name: Chess with AI
Description: Console Chess with C++. The cool thing in this project is the super strong Chess AI via minimax algorithm and alpha-beta pruning.

Name: Collision Detection
Description: 2D Simulation of objects, which can calculate interactions between objects and surfaces, that have gravity and elasticity.

Name: Balls and Boxes
Description: Fast 2 week copy of a classic brick breaker game, with some own twists.

Name: Grainraiders
Description: My first proper game project. Nothing too complicated, but really holds a nostalgic warm place in my heart. The game is actually surprisingly engaging and fun too!
